subject: [OT] Re: [junit] Blog about JUnit
msgSnippet: I just read my own post and realized that the first line sounds pretty bad.  Sorry.  I was really laughing at myself because I imagined you to be a 5 ft. 165
messageBody:
I just read my own post and realized that the first line sounds pretty
bad. Sorry. I was really laughing at myself because I imagined you to
be a 5 ft. 165 lbs. man of French and Russian descent with a fairly
thick salt and pepper beard and a thick French accent. I think that
impression comes from a coworker who was 5 ft. 165 lbs. man of French
and Russian descent with a fairly thick salt and pepper beard and a
thick French accent, whose name was Vladimir Pierot.

Sorry again if I sounded offensive.

=jason

On Thu, 2003-04-24 at 08:23, Jason Rogers wrote: Hee-hee... I must say I
didn't imagine you to look like that.

I haven't jumped on the BLOG bandwagon yet. What do you think it brings
to the table that an email group doesn't? Is it a presentation issue
(which could be a strength)? Are there other strengths?

=jason

On Thu, 2003-04-24 at 00:41, Vladimir R. Bossicard wrote: I've started a
weblog @ artima.com where I will discuss about JUnit and
JUnit-addons. So if you're interested, do not hesitate to talk back:

<http://www.artima.com/weblogs/index.jsp?blogger=vladimir>

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir R. Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
